description: The Japanese barberry (Berberis thunbergii f. atropurpurea) is an amazing ornamental shrub. Its deep, dark purple leaves and bright yellow flowers are sure to provide a burst of colour to any garden. The plant is incredibly easy to maintain and is resistant to both pests and disease. This hardy evergreen species will stay vibrant throughout the year, even in winter. Additionally, it is low maintenance and drought tolerant; the perfect addition to any low-care garden. This fantastic offering of both visual appeal and reliability makes the Japanese barberry an excellent choice.
